title: Nvidia CEO Says New OpenAI Investment May Be Largest Yet
title_zh: Nvidia 首席执行官表示新的 Openai 投资可能是迄今为止最大的一笔
summary: “We will invest a great deal of money,” Huang told reporters while visiting Taipei on Saturday.
summary_zh: “我们将投入大量资金，”黄在周六访问台北时告诉记者。

title: 'People's dad' Jensen Huang praises, pushes Nvidia suppliers on mobbed Taiwan visit
title_zh: “人民爸爸”黄仁勋称赞并推动英伟达供应商访问台湾
summary: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang praised and lightly cajoled his major Taiwanese suppliers to produce more to help power strong demand for AI, capping a visit ​to the island of his birth, where he has been mobbed by adoring fans at ‌every step.
summary_zh: 英伟达首席执行官黄仁勋赞扬并轻描淡写地劝说他的主要台湾供应商生产更多产品，以帮助满足对人工智能的强劲需求，结束了对他出生的岛屿的访问，在那里他的每一步都被崇拜的粉丝团团围住。

title: Apple: Could the memory chip shortage raise iPhone prices?
title_zh: 苹果：存储芯片短缺会导致iPhone价格上涨吗？
summary: In Apple's (AAPL) earnings call, CEO Tim Cook warned that the memory chip shortage could have an impact on the iPhone maker's gross margin in its fiscal second quarter.Maxim Group managing director and senior consumer internet analyst Tom Forte — who upgraded Apple stock to a ...
summary_zh: 在苹果公司 (AAPL) 的财报电话会议上，首席执行官蒂姆·库克 (Tim Cook) 警告称，存储芯片短缺可能会影响这家 iPhone 制造商第二财季的毛利率。Maxim Group 董事总经理兼高级消费者互联网分析师汤姆·福特 (Tom Forte) 将苹果股票评级上调...

title: Apple faces iPhone pricing challenge, supply crunch as AI demand deepens global memory chip shortage
title_zh: 随着人工智能需求加剧全球存储芯片短缺，苹果面临 iPhone 定价挑战和供应紧缩
summary: Apple's iPhones are getting stung by the global memory shortage.
summary_zh: 苹果公司的 iPhone 正受到全球内存短缺的困扰。

title: Minivan sales surge 21% in 2025 as millennial dads lead demand for cars offering the 'best bang for your buck'
title_zh: 千禧一代的爸爸们引领了对“物超所值”汽车的需求，2025 年小型货车销量将猛增 21%
summary: Most carmakers are only focused on the truck and SUV buyer, but one model saw a surge in popularity last year — the trusty family minivan.
summary_zh: 大多数汽车制造商只关注卡车和 SUV 买家，但去年有一款车型人气飙升——值得信赖的家庭小型货车。

title: What Tesla's 'profound shift' could mean for investors
title_zh: 特斯拉的“深刻转变”对投资者意味着什么
summary: Tesla (TSLA) released fourth quarter results after Wednesday's market close.
summary_zh: 特斯拉（TSLA）在周三收盘后发布了第四季度业绩。

title: US stocks end lower after Trump names Fed Chair nominee
title_zh: 特朗普任命美联储主席候选人后美股收低

title: Tesla just made it clear: It's no longer a car company
title_zh: 特斯拉刚刚明确表示：它不再是一家汽车公司
summary: “We're really moving into a future that is based on autonomy,” Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on Q4 earrings call.
summary_zh: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆·马斯克在第四季度电话会议上表示：“我们确实正在迈入一个基于自主的未来。”

title: Why your utility bills are out of control: It’s not just the arctic blast, or AI
title_zh: 为什么你的水电费失控：不仅仅是北极爆炸或人工智能
summary: Utility bills are rising faster than the rate of inflation. The aging grid, natural gas prices, and, yes, data centers, are to blame.
summary_zh: 公用事业账单的增长速度快于通货膨胀率。老化的电网、天然气价格，当然还有数据中心，都是罪魁祸首。
